timeline.title: Package on NPM
timeline.description: Published my first package on NPM.

timeline.name: Portfolio Website
timeline.title: Portfolio
timeline.description: Started creating my own portfolio website for showcasing my projects and blogs.

timeline.title: Résumé
timeline.description: Rewrote my résumé in LaTeX. Setup a GitHub action to automatically generate a PDF version of my résumé.

timeline.title: FlipKart Grid Hackathon
timeline.description: Qualified for FlipKart Grid Round 2. Built a project to replace physical warranty cards with blockchain based digital warranty cards.

timeline.title: Dracula Wallpapers Website
timeline.description: Started working on a website to host wallpapers based on the Dracula Theme.

timeline.title: Hello BSD
timeline.description: Tried my first BSD based distro, ravynOS (previously airyx).

timeline.title: Arch btw
timeline.description: Switched to Arch Linux after numerous attempts of installing it. Fixed audio and wifi issues that occured during previous installs.

timeline.title: Hello Linux
timeline.description: Started using Linux as my primary OS. Installed Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (ofcouse).
